name: Emojixy Wars
description:
Hi everyone! 

This is Emoxijy Wars, a game I made during Ludum Dare Jam 38.

Emoji raiders want to steal Milky way energy and fill it with their poopmines.  But your duty is to defeat all of them and stopping them from their goal. For this, we will incarnate the sun master, protector of the galaxy. Thanks to its powerful skills you can defeat the invaders and prevent them from filling the galaxy with their poopmines.

MUST be played with Controller!  When I made this game I was still learning the use of Unity and the basics of game development and I didn't implement keyboard support! Sorry :P

--------------------------------------------------------------
